name: Hotel Shangri-La Santa Monica

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hubby chanced upon the website and he was glued to the photos of the hotel and called me to check on it and I did!!! The question is if we dont know whether we should book it since there arent any reviews available for reference...
reviews.title: Simply Love It!!!
The Phantom Shangri La
reviews.text: We still made the choice of booking it and were sooo looking forward to the stay... The day came and we were greeted with the friendly staff and was told that the renovation was still going on. We were okay with it as long as it didnt cause inconvenience to us with the noises of drilling and we were out most of the time anyway..

description: Overlooking the Pacific since 1939, Hotel Shangri-La is a dramatic beacon of Art Deco beauty, Hollywood allure, and Los Angeles history. Perched on a high bluff, mere steps from the beach, this timeless Santa Monica boutique hotel has undergone a meticulous $30 million redesign -- promising you an idyllic haven of rejuvenation.
